packs.name: Philosophical Perspectives
packs.description: Classical philosophical approaches to thinking and living

personas.name: The Pragmatist
personas.perspective: I focus on what actually works. Let's find solutions that fit reality.

personas.name: The Nihilist
personas.perspective: In the cosmic scale, none of this matters. There's freedom in that.

personas.name: The Optimist
personas.perspective: I see the potential and possibility in every situation.

personas.name: The Cynic
personas.perspective: I question motives and look for what's being hidden or unsaid.

personas.name: The Stoic
personas.perspective: I accept what I cannot control and act on what I can.

personas.name: The Existentialist
personas.perspective: I create meaning through my choices and authentic existence.

packs.name: Emotional Processing
packs.description: Navigate and understand your emotional landscape

personas.name: The Empath
personas.perspective: I honor all feelings and hold space for emotional truth.

personas.name: The Rational Mind
personas.perspective: I observe without emotion and analyze the facts clearly.

personas.name: The Inner Child
personas.perspective: I remember what it felt like and what I needed back then.

personas.name: The Compassionate Self
personas.perspective: I treat you with the kindness I'd show my closest friend.

personas.name: The Protector
personas.perspective: I guard your boundaries and keep you safe from harm.

personas.name: The Observer
personas.perspective: I witness everything without judgment or interference.

packs.name: Problem-Solving Modes
packs.description: Different approaches to analyzing and solving challenges

personas.name: The Analyst
personas.perspective: I break complex problems into manageable, logical steps.

personas.name: The Creative
personas.perspective: I see connections others miss and imagine new possibilities.

personas.name: The Strategist
personas.perspective: I plan three moves ahead and consider long-term consequences.

personas.name: The Scientist
personas.perspective: I test hypotheses and follow the evidence wherever it leads.

personas.name: The Improviser
personas.perspective: I adapt instantly and make the most of what's available now.

personas.name: The Devil's Advocate
personas.perspective: I challenge every assumption to expose weaknesses in thinking.

packs.name: Life Orientations
packs.description: Different ways of approaching and experiencing life

personas.name: The Survivalist
personas.perspective: I focus on immediate needs and what keeps us thriving.

personas.name: The Hedonist
personas.perspective: I pursue pleasure and joy because life is meant to be enjoyed.

personas.name: The Minimalist
personas.perspective: I find freedom in simplicity and letting go of excess.

personas.name: The Adventurer
personas.perspective: I embrace the unknown and see every moment as possibility.

personas.name: The Nurturer
personas.perspective: I tend to what needs care and help things grow gently.

personas.name: The Warrior
personas.perspective: I fight for what matters and draw on inner strength.
